column4: Tesla's Musk buying over half of SolarCity bond offer - filing
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Tesla Motors  Chief Executive Elon Musk is buying $65 million of bonds from SolarCity Corp  in the latest debt offering by the solar panel company that Tesla plans to acquire for $2.6 billion  according to a filing on Tuesday.

column4: Tesla's Musk buying over half of SolarCity bond offer - filing
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  Aug 23 Tesla Motors  Chief Executive Elon Musk is buying $65 million of bonds from SolarCity Corp in the latest debt offering by the solar panel company that Tesla plans to acquire for $2.6 billion  according to a filing on Tuesday.

column4: Tesla touts speed and driving range with new upgraded battery
column5: SAN FRANCISCO/WASHINGTON Tesla Motors Inc  crowned itself the maker of the world's fastest production car on Tuesday  saying a new version of its Model S all-electric sedan can accelerate from 0-60 miles per hour in just 2-1/2 seconds.

column4: UPDATE 4-Tesla touts speed and driving range with new upgraded battery
column5: SAN FRANCISCO/WASHINGTON  Aug 23 Tesla Motors Inc crowned itself the maker of the world's fastest production car on Tuesday  saying a new version of its Model S all-electric sedan can accelerate from 0-60 miles per hour in just 2-1/2 seconds.

column4: Tesla unveils 100 kWh battery for Model S  Model X cars
column5: Aug 23 Electric car maker Tesla Motors Inc  will launch a 100 kilowatt hour (kWh) battery for its Model S and Model X cars  Chief Executive Elon Musk said on Tuesday.

column4: Tesla to unveil new product Tuesday  shares rise
column5: Aug 23 Tesla Motors Inc chief executive Elon Musk said on Tuesday that the company planned to make a product announcement later in the day  sending the company's share price higher.
